text: Lilo & Stitch is an upcoming American science fiction comedy movie. It is expected to be released on May 23, 2025. It was directed by Dean Fleischer Camp and produced by Dan Lin and Jonathan Eirich. It is a live-action remake of the 2002 movie Lilo & Stitch. The movie follows a six-year-old girl named Lilo Pelekai who adopts an alien named Stitch that crash landed on Earth. Most of the movie follows the plot of the 2002 movie. Principal photography for the movie started in Oahu, Hawaii on May 1, 2023 and ended on March 2024. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s buddy movies Category:2020s comedy movies Category:2020s fantasy movies Category:2020s science fiction movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Lilo & Stitch Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies about children Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:Movies about orphans Category:Movies about sisters Category:Movies set in Hawaii Category:Upcoming movies
title: Lilo & Stitch (2025 movie)
